name: claude-historian-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol server for searching your Claude Code conversation history
long_description:
A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for searching your Claude Code conversation history. Find past solutions, track file changes, and learn from previous work.

Features:
- Search conversations with smart ranking
- Track file changes across conversations
- Find solutions to specific errors
- Discover similar questions and patterns
- Browse recent sessions with productivity metrics
- Analyze tool usage patterns and workflows
- Generate intelligent session summaries

Fast search with smart prioritization. Zero configuration required.
